description: Defines classes and methods for representing and manipulating a directory tree structure, including inserting files and generating HTML representation.

classes.name: DirectoryNode
classes.description: Represents a node in the directory tree, which can be a file or a directory, with associated metadata and children.

classes.name: DirectoryTree
classes.description: Manages the directory structure, allowing insertion of files and HTML generation for visualization.

methods.name: insert_file
methods.description: Inserts a file into the directory tree, creating nodes as necessary and updating metadata.

methods.name: generate_html
methods.description: Generates an HTML representation of the directory tree.
